messages.subject: to Elsa, was: Re: reading late, was: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number  1633
messages.msgSnippet: I d be interested, Elsa. Hannah heard a Latin singer... some new hot personality, the other day and  asked me about learning Spanish. I have some old Muzzy
messages.messageBody:
I'd be interested, Elsa. Hannah heard a Latin singer... some new hot personality, the other day and asked me about learning Spanish. I have some old Muzzy tapes so I popped it in the VCR and she was mesmerized. She now wants me to find the book that came with the tape ( now *where* did that thing go! !!)
She does get frustrated with all the exceptions found in our language rules, so you've got a point... maybe another language would be a different place to spring from.
Thanks!
Sarah



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
